definitions.definition: To cause (a ship taken aback in a light breeze) to turn or make a circuit so as to recover, without bracing the yards, the same tack on which she had been sailing.
To deposit or inter in a chapel; to enshrine .

main_definition: ( nautical , transitive ) To cause (a ship taken aback in a light breeze) to turn or make a circuit so as to recover, without bracing the yards, the same tack on which she had been sailing.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , transitive ) To deposit or inter in a chapel; to enshrine .
